channel.title: Exp rates & atk spd
channel.description:
ok well brandon's tut didn't work.... changed every number but still same exp....
so now i have these two main things i want to change still...... i want to change exp rates.....(so that for every dmg instead of 4 exp it would be like 50000 or somethin) also atk spd(instead of atking every 5 secs or somethin i would make like 5 hits per sec.....)
so yea if anyone could help me....
